module.name: IVR
module.description: Creates Digital Receptionist (aka Auto-Attendant, aka Interactive Voice Response) menus. These can be used to send callers to different locations (eg, "Press 1 for sales") and/or allow direct-dialing of extension numbers.
module.changelog: *2.5.7* extended schema and added ability to have ivr options to return to calling parent ivrs if appropriate, otherwise specified destination *2.5.6* Added: Set(IVR_CONTEXT=${CONTEXT}) to facilitate simple returns to calling context (e.g. from an announcement or custom app) *2.5.5* Fix bug #1651 and apply patch #1664, allow voicemail as destination if ivr is entered from a queue breakout option *2.5.4* Fix bug #1417 *2.5.3* Add he_IL translation *2.5.2* Updated for freepbx 2.2.0rc2 *2.5.1* Changed name to IVR (from Digital Receptionist) *2.5* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI
